Bruce, have you been able to contact your personal friends and family members yet? Also how do you build this initial bond with the regular spirits you contact. For example, how did you make your first friendship? What started your conversation/interest in the spirit? Did they contact you and what was the initial topic of conversation, first timemeeting, and what do you talk about each time there after?
   
  Mike Edwards Cary NC

bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
          Rhonda,
 
I've been at this a long time and have built strong bonds with my spirit contacts.
 
bruce


  Bruce Halliday 




    
---------------------------------
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
From: rhondak1973@...
Date: Tue, 18 Mar 2008 16:47:48 -0700
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

        Great files Bruce!  I can hear them really clear in all of them.  Theres some people, that when I listen to their session .wavs I cant hear the messages too clearly...but urs are very clear.
  Rhonda
